      • isSignificanceEnabled

        @Contract(pure=true)
public static boolean isSignificanceEnabled()
        Returns:
        True if significance is being computed, false if not

      • makePixelMask

        public static void makePixelMask()
        Loads most recent calibration files from ShRAMP/Calibrations, and generates/saves a pixel mask of what pixels should be used in significance computation. Also computes/saves an estimate for the mean, stddev and stderr at 10 fps and 35 Celsius. Note: assumes "hot" is hotter than "cold" and "fast" is faster than "slow" TODO: return true if successful, false if not

      • needsCalibration

        @Contract(pure=true)
public static boolean needsCalibration()
        Returns:
        True if calibration run is needed, false if calibrations were successfully loaded

      • resetRunningTotals

        public static void resetRunningTotals()
        Reset running totals in ImageProcessor

        Post process a run and compute run statistics

      • setSignificanceThreshold

        public static void setSignificanceThreshold(int n_frames)
        Figure out what the threshold should be for declaring a recorded pixel value significant
        Parameters:
        n_frames - The number of frames that will be processed in this run
